Board.name: clockgame
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: Learning Clock
Board.description: Learn how to tell the time
Board.prerequisite: The concept of time. Reading the time.
Board.goal: Distinguish between time-units (hour, minute and second). Set and display time on a clock.
Board.manual: Set the clock to the time given, in the time-units shown (hours:minutes or hours:minutes:seconds). Click on the different arrows, and move the mouse, to make the numbers go up or down.
